DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine relationship nutrition , physical activity brain function breast cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Nutrition , Physical Activity , Cognition Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: The current study examine potential relationship physical activity , dietary intake , body composition cognition breast cancer cancer survivor age-matched woman without previous cancer diagnosis . Additionally , measure blood inflammatory marker explore relationship lifestyle factor inflammation . The study involve two , 1hr appointment Texas State University . The first visit include cognitive test body composition assessment . Participants give activity monitor wear one week packet questionnaires complete home . At second visit , fast blood sample collect , participant complete food frequency questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Breast cancer survivor must complete primary treatment ( chemotherapy , radiation therapy ) within past 60 month agematched control must previous cancer diagnosis Female history stroke , heart attack transient ischemic attack currently pregnant ; speak , read , write English attend test session blind legally blind ; nonsmoker current use computerbased brain training game ( e.g . Lumosity ® , BrainHQ ® ) . male < 30 > 70 year age breast cancer survivor > 60 month last treatment currently undergo primary treatment breast cancer survivor never treat chemotherapy and/or radiation previous cancer diagnosis breast cancer
